Name: It Takes Two Friend's Pass
About the game: Download Friend's Pass* to play It Takes Two with a friend — for free! Friend's Pass lets you play It Takes Two with a friend, provided they already own the full game. Here's how it works: Grab a friend who owns the full game of It Takes Two. Download Friend's Pass for free. Play the entire game together! Because whether it's splitting an ice cream sundae, grabbing a drink, spending the night on the couch or going on the craziest video game adventure of your life — everything's better when we do it together.
